text:
YALE UNIVERSITY
LAW SCHOOL
NEW HAVEN, CONNECTICUT
HAROLD D. LASSWELL
PROFESSOR OF LAW
April 13, 1954
Professor Frank E. Schooley, Treasurer
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
Thank you for notifying me of my appointment to the
Radio Program Planning Committee. I am sorry to miss
the Columbus meeting but I hope that later conferences will be
feasible.
I am behind in the completion of some memoranda that
I want to circulate first among members of this group.
Sincerely yours.
HDL/m
